oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Egypte, Nubie et Abyssinie.
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Malte-Brun, Conrad, 1775-1826
oai_dc:dc.dc:format: 1 map : hand color ; 31 x 23 cm on sheet (38 x 28)
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Antique hand colored map of Egypt, Nubia, and Abyssinia (Modern day Egypt, Sudan, Eritrea, Djibouti, and part of Ethiopia). Publication date from the library's acquisition form.
oai_dc:dc.dc:coverage: Egypt; Nubia; Sudan; South Sudan; Ethiopia; Africa
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Egypt -- Maps; Nubia -- Maps; Ethiopia -- Maps; Red Sea Region -- Maps -- Early works to 1800; Egypt -- Maps -- Early works to 1800; Nubia -- Maps -- Early works to 1800; Eritrea -- Maps -- Early works to 1800; Djibouti -- Maps -- Early works to 1800; Sudan -- Maps -- Early works to 1800; Ethiopia -- Maps -- Early works to 1800; Arabian Peninsula -- Maps -- Early works to 1800; Red Sea Region -- Administrative and political divisions -- Maps -- Early works to 1800; Arabian Peninsula -- Administrative and political divisions -- Maps -- Early works to 1800; Early maps
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: Rare Books and Special Collections Library; American University in Cairo
